item.title: Entropy of the DWH systems
item.description: This is the first post on DWH Academy starting the series of practical tips on how to build a successful data warehouse. This introduction puts Data warehouse into a wide context of physical science but in a simple friendly way Arrow of time Increasing entropy defines the direction of time in our Universe. The Universe grows from simple to complex, from ordered to unordered. Even though the entropy can decrease locally, the global increase of Universe’s entropy is irreversible.
